attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government must form an Education Taskforce to create a framework for a  fundamental change in the way we educate our children.This group of experts should include teachers and representatives from organisations like Childline.The Police and Drug Rehabilitors should also be represented. The focus should be on Discipline and Structure within our schools to ensure children develop self-motivation and greater social awareness
